amendatorysection.chaptername: Cities And Villages; Laws Applicable To More Than One And Less Than All Classes
amendatorysection.catchline: Mayor and city council members; election.
amendatorysection.para: Elections for officers listed in section 19-415 shall be conducted as provided in the Election Act. The positions for which candidates are to be nominated or elected shall appear on the ballot in the order listed in section 19-415.
